    • Method Detail

      • readLineCRLF

        public java.lang.String readLineCRLF()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        The ASCII string terminated by CRLF

        The method assume that buff is in write mode and leave it in write-mode The method never reads from the socket as long as the buffer is not empty

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - HTTPException if the connection is closed before a line could be read

      • readHeader

        Throws:

      • readBytes

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer readBytes(int size)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        size -
        Returns:
        a ByteBuffer in write-mode containing size bytes read on the socket
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - HTTPException is the connection is closed before all bytes could be read

      • readChunks

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer readChunks()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        a ByteBuffer in write-mode containing a content read in chunks mode
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - HTTPException if the connection is closed before the end of the chunks if chunks are ill-formed
